mapper.select: select LEVEL, qseq, par_qseq, LPAD(' ', 4*(LEVEL-1)) || qtitle qtitle, qcontent, pseq, id from Q_board start with par_qseq=0 connect by prior qseq=par_qseq order siblings by qseq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Q_BOARD(qseq, qtitle, qcontent, pseq, id, par_qseq) VALUES(Q_BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, NULL, NULL, #{par_qseq})
mapper.select: select qseq, qtitle, qcontent, pseq, id, par_qseq from Q_board where qseq = #{qseq}
mapper.update: UPDATE Q_BOARD SET QCONTENT=#{qcontent}, QTITLE=#{qtitle} WHERE qSEQ=#{qseq}
mapper.delete:
